title: Ottery
info: Ottery, was a daycare managment tool that was made by me, it facilitated security and communication between parents. It was used by a church and a school but had issues getting users. Note this is private since it is proprietary software.

title: wakescrape
info: My first webscraper. It pulls all of the housing data off of wake county realestate and saves them to local json files for data analysis.

title: 6 Card Golf
info: This is an AI agent which plays the game 6 card golf utilizes pytorch and Q-Learning.

title: Aliens!
info: Oh no! Aliens are invading earth! Thankfully, you're on the rocket ship that is escaping. Sit back and enjoy the experience. This was made for the purpose of making a well defined threejs engine that could be copied for threejs projects

title: guarded-components
info: This is used to protect pages or components such as buttons based on the user's state. It seems that this is a common problem in industry. This will work for most jsx compatible frameworks with any authorization strategies. This package allows the user to define strategies based on contracts that protect components.

title: ducktyper
info: This is a project is a fantastic replacement for object-validation and yup. Its goal is to provide a library for creating custom validation objects and functions with ease while maintaining a small footprint for front and backend validation to reduce repeated code.

title: metamadness
info: Metamadness is my own varient of black eye. Rather then only making a phishing attack, this also updates the meta tags to appear as it's going to a specific link.

title: usability-tracker
info: While reading the book, Don't Make Me Think, I was hit with this idea. It is a program that tracks the user movment and actions and allows saving them and playing them back.

title: eventador
info: This project seamlessly allows you to make your events more robust and usable. This is done while maintaining standard js syntax and backwards compatibility.

title: Wackamon
info: Wack-A-Mon implements the use of a FSM. This is used to simplify the code and make the program smoother. Additionally, it implements ajax to include a highscore list.

title: lewibs-keylogger
info: This keylogger was created to help save development time when the users actions needed to be verified or logged.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe
info: This was made for a matlab TA interview. It was not intended to involve machine learning, but now that has been implemented, and the program uses past games to improve upon itself.

title: Sheet-O-Matic
info: This game gives you an unfair advantage in CLUE as it looks back through past guesses and uses logic to determine who did the crime.

title: Movie Night Etc.
info: Movie Night Etc was part of an elaborate joke to make a blog. I taught myself PHP to make this website. This website is what introduced me to web development.

title: Wisdom Dog
info: I made the wisdom dog to experiment with interactive websites and see how babble works. It was my first website using the basics.

title: Functional Array
info: Arrays are a poor mans closure

title: Quick Casher
info: This utility allows you to convert a function into a caching function, enhancing performance by storing and retrieving its output based on specified options
